transcripts.text: and are encouraged to become more vulnerable, to talk about their feelings, and indeed to cry.  There is a great deal of focus on teaching boys.

But I have to point out, look at the difference in what the implication is in a name like a call to men.  And you put that against.  a voice for men, an ear for men.  Men are good.  Looking at what the real message is here, I have to also point out that this isn't anything different than my father's form of chivalry.  It's exactly what my father...

You may not be able to judge a book by its cover, but sometimes you can judge a book by its board of directors.  And guess who's on the board of directors of this fine organization?  Gloria Steinem and Eve Ensler.
